headline: CHIPOTLE'S HOCKEY JERSEY BOGO OFFER RETURNS IN THE U.S. AND CANADA FOR THE 2025 STANLEY CUP® PLAYOFFS
summary: To celebrate the 2025 Stanley Cup® Playoffs, Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) announced today a "Wear Your Hockey Jersey" program that will offer a BUY-ONE-GET-ONE (BOGO) deal on entrees to in-restaurant diners who wear a hockey jersey on Monday, April 21 after 3:00pm local time. The promotion is valid at all participating Chipotle restaurants in the U.S. and Canada.

headline: 3 Reasons Investors Love Chipotle (CMG)
summary: Over the past six months, Chipotle’s shares (currently trading at $48.67) have posted a disappointing 17.7% loss while the S&P 500 was down 8.3%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: 3 Pricey Stocks Billionaire Money Managers Sold Ahead of Wall Street's Historic Volatility
